Synopsis: Sets permissions on Group Policy Objects (GPOs) based on specified criteria.
Description: The Invoke-GPOZaurrPermission function sets permissions on GPOs based on various criteria such as GPO name, GPO GUID, AD objects, linked objects, permission levels, and more.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-GPO -All | Invoke-GPOZaurrPermission -PermissionRules { New-GPOPermission -Group "Help Desk" -AccessLevel Read } -Type "NotAdministrative"
Description:
Sets Read permission for the "Help Desk" group on all GPOs except administrative ones.
